actions.name: Cosmic Luminance
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares Sunsteel Strike
Effect: Connection - Sunsteel Strike. The user freely Moves up to half their Overland Score as Teleport Movement before attacking.

actions.name: Cosmic Luminance
actions.description: Passive: The user is immune to negative stage effects, and extends the duration of positive stage effects by 2 turns.

system.description:
Trigger: The user declares Sunsteel Strike
